cause.description:
Many children are sent to adoptive parents or foster parents who seem to be very nice but are actually evil and abusive. Child abuse is not only beating a child. It could be starvination, not having adequate living quarters, no running water available or a number of other things.
This is a very serious issue that has claimed the lives of numerous children. Help be the force that puts an end to this phenomenon.
1. Children deserve to be nurtured not beaten
cause.mission: Help suffering children in the U.S. and around the world, find a way out of abusive homes
cause.name: Help End Child Abuse
